page.title: 13BON-ACCORD BATHS 2
page.content: From 8pm until 10pm each evening their are special classes for life-saving Aberdeen swimming team,Diving club,Scuba diving club and synchronised swimming. Upstairs there are 4 sunrooms,turkish baths,sauna and gym.Here one can weight train with the Spartan Club or even join a judo club. The baths are popular with Aberdonians and tourists alike but certain improvements could be made:some showers need to be renovated and the water temperature should be kept more constant.Changing areas should be kept clean at all times and the staff should be nice and pleasant. On the whole however our class agrees that these bath are by far the best swimming facilities in Aberdeen. HARLAW ACADEMY
